mapper.select: SELECT category_id, category_name FROM COMMUNITY_CATEGORY ORDER BY category_id;

SELECT c.post_id, c.title, c.content, c.view_count, c.like_count, c.created_at, m.nickname, c.dong_code, d.dong_name, c.category_id, cc.category_name, (c.like_count * 3 + c.view_count * 1 + IFNULL(cmt.comment_count, 0) * 2) AS popularity_score FROM COMMUNITY c LEFT JOIN COMMUNITY_CATEGORY cc ON c.category_id = cc.category_id LEFT JOIN MEMBERS m ON c.user_id = m.user_id LEFT JOIN LEGAL_DONG d ON c.dong_code = d.dong_code LEFT JOIN ( SELECT post_id, COUNT(*) AS comment_count FROM COMMUNITY_COMMENT WHERE deleted_at IS NULL GROUP BY post_id ) cmt ON c.post_id = cmt.post_id
c.deleted_at IS NULL AND c.created_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)
AND c.dong_code = #{dongCode}
AND (c.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') OR c.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%'))
ORDER BY popularity_score DESC, c.created_at DESC
